document_data.caption: A map showing Ty'athalael on Evermeet.
document_data.name: Ty'athalael
document_data.mainbody: '''Ty'athalael''' was a lush valley located on the [[elf|elven]] homeland of [[Evermeet]]. The name of the valley translated roughly into [[common]] as "the peace attained through the absolute beauty of nature and harmony with one's surroundings."
document_data.Geography: The valley was located in between the [[Silver Hills]] and [[Eagle Hills]] along the center of Evermeet. The [[River Ardulith]] flowed through the valley for its entire length.
document_data.Description: Ty'athalael was filled with vineyards, farmsteads, meadows, and groves.
